item.title: Why do I blog?
item.description: Why am I starting a blog? I am creating this blog as a sort of a personal growth record keeping. The posts I am creating are usually around the areas of: books I am reading or listening to my endless quest of working on projects a public “fuck yeah list” Books As I read and listen to book, I take notes. Doing that really helps to critically understand what I am reading and it helps to retain knowledge.
